links.title: Tesla Issues Recall, Will It Hurt?
links.description: Tesla is now feeling the pinch of a big automaker. It has issued a recall. They are calling it a "proactive measure" out of an "abundance of caution," the company says, in handling an issue with a cable used in the adjusting of second-row seating in a small percent of Model X vehicles.

messages.body: $TSLA Billionaire Tesla CEO Elon Musk reveals he owns two gas cars and one is his â€˜first loveâ€™ https://www.cnbc.com/2017/10/12/tesla-ceo-elon-musk-reveals-he-owns-two-gasoline-cars.html So cute!

links.title: Billionaire Tesla CEO Elon Musk reveals he owns two gas cars and one is his 'first love'
links.description: The very first car Musk owned and liked was a gas car too - a 1978 BMW 320i, for which he paid $1,400 in 1994 and fixed it up himself, according to Forbes. He had the car for two years and then a wheel fell off when he lent the car to an intern.
